title: anjikin yAtakayya
sahitya:
anjikin yAtakayya sajjanarige anjikin yAtakayya


anupallavi

  sanjIva rAyara smaraNe mADida mEle 


caraNam 1    kanasili manasili kaLavaLavAdre hanumana nenedare hAri hOgade pApa
    caraNam 2    rOma rOmake kOTi lingavu durisida bhImana nenedare biTTu hOgade pApa
    caraNam 3    purandara viTTalana pUjeya mADuva guru madhva rAyara smaraNe mADida mEle
